attributes.action: ensure that MPs do not exempt themselves from any freedom of information legislation except that which clearly has a MP/constituency confidentiality element.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you have nothing to hide then you have nothing to worry about. 

To prevent MPs from hiding and exempting themselves from any freedom of information legislation (which may be used to hide their decisions, expenses, interests, and any other genuine legitimate interests except that which is CLEARLY of a MP/constituency interest, and even then subject to genuine public interest/concern).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
